scripts.build-extension: pnpm minify-js && pnpm process-html && pnpm copy-assets && pnpm create-zip
scripts.minify-js: pnpm exec terser extension/js/searchbar.js extension/js/startup.js extension/js/modal.js -c -m --output extension/dist/bundle.min.js
scripts.copy-assets: xcopy /E /I /Y extension\css extension\dist\css && xcopy /E /I /Y extension\fonts extension\dist\fonts && xcopy /E /I /Y extension\assets extension\dist\assets && xcopy /E /I /Y extension\icons extension\dist\icons && copy /Y extension\manifest.json extension\dist\
